website_summaries.verdict: Best overall exam prep with thorough practice questions, explanations of answers, and up-to-date information.
pros: Provides extensive information on every topic covered on the ACT
Gain access to online resources in addition to the book
Focuses on teaching concepts key to exam success
cons: Book may be too general in some areas
Organization of topics could be better

customer_reviews.title: The questions and passages are EXACTLY like the actual test!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought many ACT prep books, but I can't stress this enough: the Manhattan Prep 5 lb Series is the only one I needed. The questions are exactly like the ones on the test, especially for reading and math. I remember doing a math problem in the book, and seeing that same problem, VERBATIM, on the test. Just use this book wisely and you will do well. I tore out a few pages at a time and completed them day by day to practice, practice, practice. I highly recommend this book for anyone. I wouldn't have scored a 34 on the ACT without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the standard ACT Prep book in the best way.  Topics are split into specific topics.  Great supplement to practice tests.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional tutor and have worked with over 100 students specifically on ACT test prep. This is an excellent resource to use with a tutor, or if the student is already aware of what concepts they are struggling with, but the evaluations are rather limited, which make it difficult for someone to use this book to its full potential on their own. The fact that the topics are broken up into large practice sets is invaluable to me as an academic coach, and I would suggest this to any student or tutor to supplement work with full test sets. Great value at cost. I've bought several already for my tutoring company.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set of Practice Problems
customer_reviews.text: I like the book for the amount of practice problems but my daughter might disagree as she has done many of them with so many left. Great study aid for anyone needing practice for the ACT.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good book!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an ACT tutor and I use this book for my tutoring students. I love this book because it is divided into sections of knowledge. It is very suitable for students to practice. However, it does not really have many the content match with current ACT test. Anyway, this is the good book for practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Rather Nice book
customer_reviews.text: This is really good. I mean for 5 lb there has to be good information in it. However, You do have to be very self motivated to read 1000+ pages of ACT preparation. In conclusion, I would recommend this book for any overachievers or people who like studying. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: The Must-Have ACT book
customer_reviews.text: If your child is taking the ACT, this book is a must-have. Clear, well-written explanations for all sections - it's as if you have a tutor in the room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leto28

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need to improve your score. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is all you need to improve your score. The key is to understand why you missed a given question.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my 2 students that I tutoring (at present) ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my 2 students that I tutoring (at present) in all subjects , better than any ACT book printed in my opinion, and have taught hundreds in ACTs thank you will buy more always
customer_reviews.author: Debora M. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This book is quality for ACT prepping. It contains ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is quality for ACT prepping. It contains many problems and they are comparable to the actual ACT problems. It is really five pounds which is heavy, so it's not very portable!
customer_reviews.author: VAreader507

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, I went from a 21 to a 25 and I barely used the book. I can only imagine what score I would’ve got if I had actually used the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Leeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Has a ton of practice problems just like the ones on the act
customer_reviews.text: Has a ton of practice problems just like the ones on the act. You can't go wrong with a ton of practice
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: and is set up like actual ACT Tests
customer_reviews.text: It seriously is 5lbs, and is set up like actual ACT Tests. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying it. Last year for my daughter and this year for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Anuk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son says it's the most effective prep book he uses.
customer_reviews.author: banshee

customer_reviews.title: English teacher's favorite
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 11th grade English teacher and I buy a lot of ACT books. I think I have close to 20. This is going to be my favorite one. The way I tutor students is to review the skills that a student needs. This book approaches a passage with the intent to break down each question by skill. This is going to save me a lot of time labeling questions. The charts after each passage are great. I looked at the math section and it is equally organized by skill.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Groves

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: This book offers a lot of information, but I found it poorly organized and difficult to navigate. I would not recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: Good book.
customer_reviews.text: LOTS of problems broken down into different categories within each subject area. Good explanations of each question, also.
customer_reviews.author: horseman

customer_reviews.title: Great practice book
customer_reviews.text: Great practice book. Has tons of sample tests and best of all, gives rationale for answers, which a lot of books do not.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great for self-study for high school kids in need of the additional test prep.
customer_reviews.author: YF

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: This book was truly helpful & opened the gateway for me to make an exceedingly higher score on my ACT. I would recommend this book to anyone who's currently a senior and taking the test or anyone else below that grade level that's going to take this test in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This book is helpful. It is helping me, ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is helpful. It is helping me, think a little more when I am reading the passages and answering the multiple choice questions.
customer_reviews.author: Giavanna  Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The explanations are very thorough (especially for the math section).
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This book DRAMTICALLY improved my english section on the ACT ...
customer_reviews.text: This book DRAMTICALLY improved my english section on the ACT. I went from an 18 on English to well over a score of 32 in the English Section. It helped me a lot in reading as well. I went from a 21 to a 27 in reading. As far as math goes however, it didn't really help because it wasn't at the level of difficulty for the real ACT math. I counteracted this weakness by buying the Official Red ACT Prep book and the Black ACT Prep. This book is really helpful as far as Science goes as well. I went from a 21 to a 26. Soooo thank-you whoever made this book. :)
customer_reviews.author: Alanna P Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Good for high school students preparing for the ACT
customer_reviews.text: Really helpful, has many, many practice questions. Good for high school students preparing for the ACT.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good book, lots of practice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this book to help my 11th grader advisory practice for the ACT. It has some really good practices and breaks down each section of the test into parts so students can focus on their area(s) of weakness. It also provides wonderfully detailed explanations of the answers.
customer_reviews.author: mariposa14953

customer_reviews.title: Practice, practice, practice to get a better score!
customer_reviews.text: This book is a great test prep book - my daughter used it in conjunction with the RealACT prep guide and practiced, practiced, practiced. While she didn't need to learn the techniques for the test, she definitely needed to work on speed so that she could finish each section of the test. This book was a great way to improve her speed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good but too much ambiguity.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an ACT tutor and I use this book with many of my tutoring students. I like this more than many of the unofficial problem books because of the variety of questions and organization. I do wish there was a longer trig section, as most students need more practice than the book provides. When compared to actual ACT problems these are often vaguely worded or have multiple interpretations that I wouldn't normally encounter. I'm considering providing 'update notes' to my students to correct these, which I feel like I shouldn't need to do.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this book
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this book. I love that it has detailed explanations of how to complete every problem. I have my 10 year old and 12 year old working out of this book. I am choosing the problems I know they should be able to complete. It is a very helpful tool for all of us. It's never too early to get started on preparation for the ACT.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna E Price

customer_reviews.title: Great diagnostic tests
customer_reviews.text: The diagnostic tests in this text are remarkably accurate. With my ACT students, I use this text in conjunction with Barron's ACT (Stewart).
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great GRE practice book
customer_reviews.text: Great GRE practice book! So much to work off and all full of review problems. love it. great bang for your buck. definetely get this one and or over the kaplan study book
customer_reviews.author: Maria Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Good additional practice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for additional ACT practice because he had run out of practice tests he hadn't already taken. Very satisfied. good problems with good explanations.
customer_reviews.author: Techie Working Mother

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sounded like a good book for my granddaughter. She said it was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Ddee

customer_reviews.title: Really love this book!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this book and love how it shows the topics of what you got wrong (like commas, etc.) I decided that every day I would do a different subject to improve my self better. Love how they explain ALL the answers. This book is pretty thick. So glad I bought this book, just make sure to buy a book that will help you LEARN whats on the ACT. This book is just praticing whats on the ACT. If you learn + Pratice you are bound to make a 32 and up!
customer_reviews.author: Smile4all

customer_reviews.title: The best ACT practice book out there!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews for products, but this book is the best! It has ample practice to prepare you for all kinds of different problems on the ACT, especially for Math (Pre algebra, elementary algebra, intermediate algebra, plane geometry and trigonometry)
customer_reviews.author: Pavit Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The reading problems does not resemble the ones on the real tests
customer_reviews.author: Ruichuan Xu

product_meta.title: 5 lb. Book of ACT Practice Problems (Manhattan Prep 5 lb)
